title: Johnny de Lima
text: Johnny de Lima (born 21 July 1964) is a Danish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>.
